detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and slim legs with creases.
Joggers in soft cotton corduroy with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Jersey lining.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back, chest pocket and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and padded cups with removable inserts. Double narrow shoulder straps, a mesh section at the back and wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Body in ribbed jersey with a low-cut back, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless, fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend.
Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Weekend bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. One zipped inner compartment and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size approx. 21x35x48 cm.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Hat knitted in soft cotton with sewn-on ears at the top and a ribbed hem.

prod_name: LOGG Terra wide leg linen trs
detail_desc: Full-length trousers in washed linen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boots in imitation suede with an ankle-height shaft, padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Pile linings, jersey insoles and chunky, patterned soles.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Vest top in a ribbed viscose blend with a slightly deeper neckline front and back.
V-neck bustier in woven fabric with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a front fastening and inset, hole-embroidered trims at the hem. Lined.

Jacket in soft, patterned cotton twill with a collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, drawstring at the waist and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the cuffs. Lined.
Classic jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a tab and button at the sides of the hem. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Tiered skirt in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front for easier nursing access and seam under the bust. Bottoms with a wide waist panel that is elasticated at the top for best fit over the tummy, and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Velour hooded top with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide top in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Double-layered polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight hem with slits in the sides.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Ballet pumps in braided imitation leather with a hole pattern, pointed toes and open heels with long ties. Imitation leather linings and rubber soles.

Small bag decoration in transparent plastic with a holographic finish in the shape of a handbag with space for keys or other small items. The bag has a handle and flap with a press-stud fastening. Metal chain with a keyring and carabiner hook at the top. Size of bag: Height 6 cm. Width 7.5 cm. Depth 2.5 cm. Length of key chain 10 cm.
Top in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Jersey lining at the front of the top.
Braided belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned jersey with a round neck and short butterfly sleeves.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 1.4 cm.
Fitted jumper in fine, rib-knit merino wool with long sleeves.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem.

Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
5-pocket shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a fake fly and button.
3/4-length leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in a patterned weave with a sewn-in wrapover with a draped effect at the front and decorative tie at one side. Concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in a soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Vertical seams down the front and top of the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long, straight sleeves.
Straight-style top in sturdy, striped cotton jersey with long sleeves.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long skirt in jacquard-weave mesh with wide elastication at the waist. Jersey underskirt.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a coloured stripe down the sides. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed style with a slightly lower crotch, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist with a concealed drawstring and key pocket, and short slits in the sides.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Oval metal earrings. Size 4x3.5 cm.
Short, one-shoulder dress in woven fabric with a puff sleeve at one side. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a fitted skirt. Lined bodice.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length denim skirt with a paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a tie at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, back pockets, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening, and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an embroidered pattern, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Skinny fit through the hip, thigh and leg. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a cut-out section at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, shimmering metallic dress in pleated jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a raw-edge hem. Jersey underdress.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Bomber jacket in shimmering, patterned satin with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long sleeves and ribbing with a glittery stripe around the collar, cuffs and hem. Lined.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
